definition: to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考核结果作为任免预备役军官职务的主要依据。

sentences.english: Deep-seated reason lies in utilitarian assessing by the law enforcement agencies.
sentences.chinese: 深层原因是对执法机关功利性的考核造成的。

sentences.english: The lowliest place elimination series are the achievements inspection one system.
sentences.chinese: 末位淘汰制是绩效考核的一种制度走廊顶装修效果图。

sentences.english: This system has a facilitative effect of formative assessment on learners' learning to their utmost.
sentences.chinese: 最大可能的发挥形成性考核对学生学习的促进作用。

sentences.english: Refer to the Performance Evaluation Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 参照公司另行制定的绩效考核表。

sentences.english: 5of the trial personnel try and assessment survey.
sentences.chinese: 对试用人员之试工与考核调查。

sentences.english: We have to do all of that for their team contribution as well.
sentences.chinese: 我们也应该根据他们团队的贡献来考核他们。

sentences.english: The performance of officeholder assesses the core that is incentive mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 公务员的绩效考核是激励机制的核心。

sentences.english: This article pay attention to administrators'performance evaluation in non-for-profit hospital.
sentences.chinese: 特别关注了非营利性医院管理层的绩效考核。

sentences.english: Don’t wait for performance review time.
sentences.chinese: 不要等到绩效考核时间才那么干。

sentences.english: Again, the reform of the "two courses" assessment method.
sentences.chinese: 再次，改革“两课”的考核方法。

sentences.english: The 3rd, the second-round exam is the assessment of pair of examinee knowledge faces.
sentences.chinese: 第三，复试是对考生知识面的考核。

sentences.english: IV. Scientifically examining and timely disposing of the non-performing loans of small enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 要科学考核和及时处置小企业不良贷款。

sentences.english: The deputy director and accountant are appointed by the director through professional examination and assessment.
sentences.chinese: 副主任和会计人选经专业考试考核，由主任聘任。

sentences.english: Certificate of acceptance of contract product quality signed by both parties in two copies.
sentences.chinese: 由双方签署的合同产品考核验收合格证书一式两份。

sentences.english: The gymnastic testing standard should change according to the development of the times.
sentences.chinese: 体操普修课的考核标准应随时代的发展而变化。

definition: to promote to a higher position
sacking the worst-performing employee/elimination of the worst-performing contestant
